
int[] votes = new int[{0}];
for (int i = 0, d = 0, l = {1}; i < l; i++) {{
    for (int j = i + 1; j < l; j++) {{
        votes[d] = decisions[d] > 0 ? i : j;
        d++;
    }}
}}

int[] amounts = new int[{1}];
for (int i = 0, l = {0}; i < l; i++) {{
    amounts[votes[i]] += 1;
}}

int class_val = -1,
    class_idx = -1;
for (int i = 0, l = {1}; i < l; i++) {{
    if (amounts[i] > class_val) {{
        class_val = amounts[i];
        class_idx = i;
    }}
}}
return classes[class_idx];
